Package gui

Class MazePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • gui.MazePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class MazePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    An instance is responsible for drawing the underlying maze on the screen. The MazePanel should contain only static images that don't need to change unless the screen is redrawn.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                 int screenWidth,
                 int screenHeight,
                 GUI gui)
        Create a new MazePanel of a given size
        Parameters:
        cav - The Cavern to display
        screenWidth - The width of the panel, in pixels
        screenHeight - The height of the panel, in pixels
        gui - The GUI that owns this MazePanel
